title: How to Turn a Green Bell Pepper Red

steps.title: Purchase the green bell pepper.
steps.content: Purchase the green bell pepper. Or as many as you wish.

steps.title: Place the bell pepper inside a brown paper bag.
steps.content: Place the bell pepper inside a brown paper bag. The more bell peppers, the larger the bag needs to be. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Add a banana.
steps.content: Add a banana. Fold down the bag and leave. The banana will turn the green bell pepper red. [2] X Research source
